short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple clicking game where you try to earn as much money as possible! How rich can you get?

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple clicking game where you try to earn as much money as possible! Use your income to buy new items and upgrades to increase your income, and earn even more money. Progress from being broke to becoming the richest man on Earth, with a prestige system to increase your earnings. Can you earn enough money to buy the world?
